data.title: Middle East Current Time
data.meta_description: Current local time in Middle East with information about Middle East time zones and daylight saving time.
data.text:
In the Middle East Transcontinental Region four different time zones are used. These time zones span from UTC (GMT) +2 hours to UTC (GMT) +4 hours. Iran sets their standard time as UTC (GMT) +3.5 hours.

Daylight Saving Time is used in Iran, Israel, Jordan, Lebanon, the Palestinian regions, and Syria but each country has different starting and ending times. For more information about Middle East Region time zones and daylight saving time view the individual Middle East countries listed below.

Middle East Time Zone Map
